# Cyber Resilience  Workflows

- Generate Normal Workload, which is used to train detection algorithms to adapt to the customer's normality and offer better performance.
- Simulate/Emulate Ransomware Attack
- Detect Malicious iSCSI Read/Write Commands Patterns
- Fetch Metrics Data from PowerStore Server
- Detect Suspicious Ransomware Activity in PPDM
- Detect Ransomware in Nearline (Decision Point)
- Pack Incident Response Data in Case a Ransomware Activity is Detected
- Initial Investigation of a Security Incident in the SIEM
- Execute a Playbook in XDR/SOAR
- Execution of Response Actions in Nearline
